EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Email For Mentor
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome mail
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We welcome you to this platform, I would like to thank you for dedicating your valuable time and energy into the mentoring program, to help increase preparedness, confidence, and knowledge of Student's future career.
Please Click this link to login and view courses and enroll under them.
Best Wishes Utilitarian Labs
